title: I can't log on

replies.body: Same Problem here aswell, although it's stuck on "Authenticating..."

Having a similar problem. Restarted client 5-8 times then restarted computer then restarted client another two times before I could log on. Then after I logged on waited a 1-2 mins for chat to connect and after that got two unknown error messages which was the cause behind this entire cycle.

Yeah, I can't log on my one either! riot's gotta fix this
{{champion:122}}
I too am stuck on a eternal "logging in" loop. Wonder what's going on?
